plot.content:
Another version of plots/388.

I plotted with a slow speed of 4% for the ink Soft Mint (blue) and a faster speed of 12% for the red (Poppy Red ink), which have a cool effect of having different stroke width.

was live plotted on https://twitch.tv/greweb

prev.content:
This was implemented for genuary.art "VHS" of JAN.18. This is making fun of curves to recreate the idea of digital tapes. Using two colors.

Made another version on which I must have accidentally dropped water on.

was live plotted on https://twitch.tv/greweb

data.title: VHS
data.description: This was implemented for genuary.art VHS of JAN.18. This is making fun of curves to recreate the idea of digital tapes. Using two colors.

next.content:
This was implemented for genuary.art "Self portrait" of JAN.28.

using curves, spirals and distributing them based on my avatar.

was live coded and live plotted on https://twitch.tv/greweb
